com.ers.internship.dao

Interface CrudDao<IdType,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    IdType - the type of entity's ID
    E - the type of current entity
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FxQuoteDao, InstrumentPriceQuoteDao, SearchingDao<IdType,E>, TransactionDao, YieldCurveDao

    public interface CrudDao<IdType,E>
    Author:
    Snejina Yanakieva

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(IdType id)
      The database is historized thus the entity is updated and it is not deleted.
      E loadById(IdType id, Calendar date)
      Returns entity in a certain period of validity
      void save(E object)
      Creates or updates an entity in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save(E object)
        Creates or updates an entity in the database. If the item does not exist in the database it is created, else it is updated.
        Parameters:
        object - The entity to be created or updated

      • delete

        void delete(IdType id)
        The database is historized thus the entity is updated and it is not deleted.
        Parameters:
        id - The entity's ID

      • loadById

        E loadById(IdType id,
           Calendar date)
        Returns entity in a certain period of validity
        Parameters:
        id - The component entity's ID
        date - Date of validity
        Returns:
        entity
